name: Layer One Media
description:
Founded in 2000, Layer One Media is a Sitecore and Umbraco Marketing solutions agency dedicated to helping businesses deliver high quality leads and grow revenue. We are ahead of the increasing demand for marketing automation in the B2B world, and are leading in its delivery. At Layer One Media, we know the site launch is not the end game. Rather, it’s the beginning of an enlightened marketing automation program.
With expertise in Web and B2B marketing, we deliver highly effective, integrated campaigns that align sales and marketing, increase revenue and maximize efficiency for businesses with multi-touch sales cycles.
